attributes.action: Making hedgehog highways standard in manufacturing of fence panels
attributes.additional_details: I think the government should do something as hedgehogs have now been marked going extinct and we need to do something to help the thrive again.
attributes.background: I want hedgehog highways made standard as hedgehog have been red listed and we need to do everything we can to help them thrive again.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't repsonsible for fence designs. 

You might like to sign and share this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550379
